title: Nadikvari Park
about: Nadikvari Park is located in Kakheti, in the city of Telavi, in the eastern part of the city, on a hill. It is a culture and recreation park and one of the best places in the city to unwind. The garden has beautiful lawns, walking paths, benches, a fountain, an amphitheater, children's attractions. The well-maintained space, huge trees, flower gardens and amazing views of the city, Alazani Valley and the Caucasus create a wonderful space for entertainment and relaxation with family or friends and attract many people.
